item.title: These women helped bring down a president - now they say they feel invisible
item.description: A snap presidential election has exposed South Korea's stark gender divide.

item.title: Hundreds arrested in Paris clashes after PSG Champions League win
item.description: The majority of fans celebrated peacefully, but nearly 300 people were arrested by police.

item.title: US sends nuclear deal proposal to Iran
item.description: It comes after the UN nuclear watchdog warned Iran has stepped up its production of enriched uranium.

item.title: As Punjabi hip-hoppers go global, bhangra outfits get a makeover
item.description: New-age Punjabi music artists are blending Western outfits with tradition, reflecting a broader cultural shift.

item.title: The Mississippi town behind the box office hit Sinners
item.description: Ryan Coogler presented his smash-hit Sinners in Clarksdale, Mississippi, which served as inspiration for his genre-defying movie.
